main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Ann Arbor, Michigan on March 24, 1959, observed by a resident while driving.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant, silvery, disc-shaped object moving rapidly with a bright, flashing light., The sighting lasted approximately 15 to 20 seconds., The witness believed the object to be of unidentified nature., No other witnesses reported the sighting., The object disappeared from view after traveling in a straight line from north to south.
witness description: a resident of the area, on his way to work
